Class DefaultHttpContentProcessor

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.micronaut.core.async.subscriber.SingleThreadedBufferingSubscriber<R>
      • io.micronaut.core.async.processor.SingleThreadedBufferingProcessor<io.netty.buffer.ByteBufHolder,io.netty.buffer.ByteBufHolder>
        • io.micronaut.http.server.netty.DefaultHttpContentProcessor
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Completable, Emitter<io.netty.buffer.ByteBufHolder>, Toggleable, HttpContentProcessor<io.netty.buffer.ByteBufHolder>, Processor<io.netty.buffer.ByteBufHolder,io.netty.buffer.ByteBufHolder>, Publisher<io.netty.buffer.ByteBufHolder>, Subscriber<io.netty.buffer.ByteBufHolder>

    public class DefaultHttpContentProcessor
extends SingleThreadedBufferingProcessor<io.netty.buffer.ByteBufHolder,io.netty.buffer.ByteBufHolder>
implements HttpContentProcessor<io.netty.buffer.ByteBufHolder>
    This class will handle subscribing to a stream of HttpContent.
    Since:
    1.0
    Author:
    Graeme Rocher
